name: Black Haven
description:
This is my first game, which I made in my own custom engine (that I programmed from scratch in JavaFX). I'm 16 years old and take inspiration from the LucasArts adventure games of the '90s.

It is a simple point & click adventure game with multiple ways of solving some puzzles, and no it has dead end scenarios (not intentionally, at least).

The controls are as follows:

  • Left Click = Interact
  • Right Click = Examine
  • Middle Mouse Click = Inventory
  • Escape = Menu
  • (F3 = Debug Menu)
